attributes.action: Petition for a Park in Thornton L23 Sefton Area
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for the residents of the Thornton area of Sefton, and supporters, to sign. We are petitioning for a park for the children in our area. The facilities in our community are minimal, especially for the children ages 5+. We want a park for our children to play and enjoy, within our local area.

Please sign if you are fed up with the facilities on offer here and want more for your children!

We want the government to address this issue as soon as possible so our children don't have to go without. We want somewhere for the children to play that is safe and local to their home and most importantly it is FREE for ALL children.

rejection.details: This is a matter for your local Council, although you may also wish to contact your MP to get support.
